title: Bloom’s Taxonomy-Based Assessment Design for Pharmacotherapy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening job-linked learning through smartphone-based LMS access.

learning_goals: Enhancement of problem-solving abilities in pharmacotherapy aligned with Bloom's Taxonomy six-level framework (Remembering-Understanding-Applying-Analyzing-Creating-Evaluating).
Improvement of learner-specific weak areas (analysis-synthesis-evaluation stages) by over 20% within three weeks.
Achievement of over 80% critical thinking application cases through formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
